content.description:
Sofonisba Anguissola, Italian painter, Self-portrait at the Easel, 1556

Galleria degli Uffizi, Florence, Tuscany, Italy/Bridgeman Images

The artist portrays herself creating a portrait of the Virgin Mary and Christ child.
content.question:
In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.

a) Describe one way in which the painting reflects developments during the Italian Renaissance.

b) Describe one way in which the painting is making a claim regarding the status of women.
